description: The 107 is a rugged, accurate probe that measures temperature of air, soil, or water from -35° to +50°C. It easily interfaces with most Campbell Scientific dataloggers and can be used in a variety of applications.
method_description: The 107 consists of a thermistor encapsulated in an epoxy-filled aluminum housing. The housing protects the thermistor allowing the probe to be buried in soil or submerged in water.
name: Campbell 107-L
